product_name: REI Expedition-Weight Long Underwear Bottoms - Girls'
long_description: Our warmest thermal bottoms for girls, the soft and thick REI Expedition-Weight long underwear bottoms make an excellent next-to-skin layer for winter adventures in extreme cold.
